name: GoDeviceHome
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: go device home
des:
No Additional hardware is required.
This skill only works for AVS enabled devices with display and which has Alexa Presentation Language support capability. 
Upon launching this skill, AVS devices display "Home" on the screen and that is the only functionality supported by this skill
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
